name: Mastodonte
description:
Mastodonte is an attempt to revitalize the classic genre of Shoot 'Em Ups, adding a new layer of possibilities with the mechanics of swapping the view from Vertical to Horizontal scrolling.

Context:

The clash takes place in a not-so-distant future, where Ivory Coast is a military and scientific superpower, and needs to deal with the daring of other nations. You are in control of three ivorian elite pilots from the squadron Mastodonte, and will need to survive different types of assignments.


Characteristics:

  • Each Life is a different aircraft that can be upgraded independently.
  • Directional shield with destructive power.
  • Reversible cannon to shoot backwards.
  • Aileron Roll to avoid projectiles.
  • Music-driven levels.
  • Original 2.5D art style.
